title: President appoints Shahid Hussain as Rector LUMS
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 22 (APP):President Dr Arif Alvi approved the appointment of Shahid Hussain as Rector Lahore University of Management Sciences (LUMS) for another five years.
The President approved the appointment under section 11(1) of LUMS charter 1985.
He also sanctioned the appointment of Saima Amin Khawaja as Trustee Board of Trustees LUMS under section 13(1) of LUMS charter 1985.
